personalInfo.name: MASHATE AYOUB
personalInfo.title: Full-stack Java/JEE Developer
personalInfo.bio: Passionate full-stack developer with expertise in Java/JEE technologies. Experienced in creating and developing internal applications and platforms, with a strong background in computer science and business intelligence.

experience.title: Full-stack Java/J2EE Developer
responsibilities: Creating and developing internal applications and platforms using Java 8/11, Primefaces, JSF, Hibernate, and Spring
Assisting in deployment, migration, and configuration of new platforms
Tracking and fixing bugs; Refactoring code to improve efficiency and maintainability

projects.title: Cardiographic Telemonitoring System
projects.description: Using Petri nets to model, analyze, and optimize a cardiographic telemonitoring system for the Master's thesis.
